Subbed Projects.Show Name: Honoo no Haramase Paidol My★Star Gakuen Z The Animation

Good Comments: The translator needed to listen better and/or use the dictionary more. Half of the subtitles can hardly be called translations as they don't correctly convey the meaning of what was said.
Few mistranslations which could confuse ppl who want to take in what little story this hentai had in in.

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Houkago Renai Club: Koi no Étude

Good Comments: they sub alot of hentai and complete the series
nice subbing being in the hentai group you dont see much quality
Easy to read font and translations.

Subbed Projects.Show Name: JK to Orc Heidan: Aku Buta Oni ni Ryougyaku Sareta Seijo Gakuen

Good Comments: The only option I could see for English. Hardsubs only, though, which means I can't remux the subs to fix the several typos left in the final release. Still, the subs look good.

Gets the point across. A few irregularities here and there, but for the most part a solid interpretation that achieves the task of relaying the message to non-Japanese speakers reliably, effectively, and accurately.
It was timed very well and was easy to read
Bad Comments: They still sub, hentai and still making a hell of a job.

Bad Comments: HD from Blu-Ray and great translation!

They translate the story part mostly right, but most lines during h scenes are totally wrong.
